children.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<bool> OnTestCaseCleanupFailure(TContext ctxt, Exception exception)
Protected Overridable Function OnTestCaseCleanupFailure(ctxt As TContext, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case
The exception that caused the cleanup failure (may be an instance of if more than one exception occurred).

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown are converted into fatal exception messages (via ) and sent to the message bus in ctxt.
children.summary: This method is called when an exception was thrown while cleaning up, after the test case has run. By default, this sends .

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<bool> OnTestCaseFinished(TContext ctxt, RunSummary summary)
Protected Overridable Function OnTestCaseFinished(ctxt As TContext, summary As RunSummary) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case
The execution summary for the test case.

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown will contribute to test case cleanup failure.
children.summary: This method will be called when the test case has finished running. By default, this sends . Override this to enable any extensibility related to test case finish.

content.value: Protected Overridable Function OnTestCaseStarting(ctxt As TContext) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown will contribute to test case failure (and will prevent the test case from running). Even if this method records exceptions, will be called.
children.summary: This method will be called before the test case has started running. TBy default, this sends . Override this to enable any extensibility related to test case start.

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.

children.summary: Executes the administrivia around running a test case, while leaving the actual test case execution up to .

Protected MustOverride Function RunTestCase(ctxt As TContext, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case
The exception that was caused during startup; should be used as an indicator that the downstream tests should fail with the provided exception rather than going through standard execution

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.

children.summary: Override this to run the test case.

content.value: protected virtual void SetTestContext(TContext ctxt, TestEngineStatus testCaseStatus)
Protected Overridable Sub SetTestContext(ctxt As TContext, testCaseStatus As TestEngineStatus)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case

children.remarks: This method must never throw. Behavior is undefined if it does. Instead, exceptions that occur should be recorded in the aggregator in ctxt and will be reflected in a way that's appropriate based on when this method is called.
children.summary: Sets the current for the current test case and the given test case status.

summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running test cases.
remarks: This class does not make any test-related assumptions about test cases, only that at some point, a test case will be "run" and results will be provided. As such, it has no definitions that related to tests (or ). The intention with this base class is that it can serve as a base for non-traditional test cases, such as injecting errors into the test pipeline during discovery that aren't uncovered until execution time.

content.value: public abstract class TestCaseRunnerBase<TContext, TTestCase> where TContext : TestCaseRunnerBaseContext<TTestCase> where TTestCase : class, ITestCase
Public MustInherit Class TestCaseRunnerBase(Of TContext As TestCaseRunnerBaseContext(Of TTestCase), TTestCase As {Class, ITestCase})

typeParameters.description: The context type used by the runner
The type of the test case used by the test framework. Must derive from .
